LLoCa documentation
====================

.. image:: /_static/lloca.png
   :align: center
   :width: 100%

This documentation describes the ``lloca`` package,
available under https://github.com/heidelberg-hepml/lloca.

* :doc:`quickstart`
* :doc:`lloca-vs-lgatr`
* :doc:`more-backbones/index`
* :doc:`numerics`
* :doc:`api`

--------
